title: Ruby Rose and Isla Fisher walk the red carpet at the Australians in Film Awards in Los Angeles
text:
Ruby Rose and Isla Fisher joined a host of famous faces on the red carpet for this year's Australians in Film Awards in LA.

The acting superstars stepped out to celebrate the 8th annual awards gala at the InterContinental Hotel in downtown Los Angeles on Wednesday (PT).

The prestigious gongs honour Australia's most talented figures in the entertainment industry who have made a name for themselves both at home and overseas.

Dazzling: Ruby Rose, 33, (pictured) made a glittering appearance in a bedazzled black suit jacket with harem-style pants

What a dazzler! Ruby Rose wore the boxy jacket over a black shirt and paired her outfit with smart, black shoes

Orange Is The New Black star Ruby, 33, made a glittering appearance in a bedazzled black suit jacket with harem-style pants.

Styling her hair in her trademark quiff, Ruby went for a smart and sophisticated look.

The Batwoman actress opted for dewy make-up, enhancing her cheek bones with a touch of rosy pink blusher.

Meanwhile Isla, 43, put on a busty display in a revealing green frock with deep V-neckline.

Gorgeous in green: Isla Fisher (pictured) put on a busty display in a revealing green frock with deep V-neckline

Statement: Featuring statement frilly sleeves and a bow just beneath her bust, Isla flaunted her gorgeous figure in the floor-length gown

Featuring statement frilly sleeves and a bow just beneath her bust, Isla flaunted her gorgeous figure in the floor-length gown.

The wife of Sacha Baron Cohen, with whom she has three children, wore her red hair over one shoulder in flawless curls, while she accessorised her look with green jewel earrings.

She paired her bold dress with a gorgeous berry lip and shimmering smokey eye shadow.

Inside the event, Isla stopped for a sweet photo with British actress Naomi Watts.

Famous friends! Naomi Watts (pictured, left) stopped for a sweet photo with Isla inside the event

Floral fancy: Home and Away star Naomi Watts (pictured) opted for a flowery, maxi dress with ruched sleeves

Naomi, who made her film debut in the Australian drama For Love Alone, opted for a flowery, maxi dress with ruched sleeves.

The 51-year-old star accessorised the floor-length frock with a diamond bracelet and a rainbow-coloured clutch.

Naomi wore her glossy, blonde locks straight in an elegant bob.

High drama! Naomi's make-up was kept natural and light to enhance the dramatic pop of colour on her lips

Her make-up was kept natural and light to enhance the dramatic pop of colour on her lips.

Australian actress Sarah Snook was another famous face gracing the red carpet.

The 31-year-old Succession star wore a daring black frock which showed off her ample cleavage.

The elegant sheer gown featured diagonal stripes of black beading to cover her modesty and enhance her envious figure.

Dare to bare! Australian actress Sarah Snook (pictured) was another famous face gracing the red carpet

She styled her shoulder-length auburn hair in a long bob and slicked a dramatic red shade on her lips.

But it wasn't just the ladies getting dressed up to the nines for Wednesday's event.

Brotherhood star Jason Clarke, 50, cut a sharp figure on the red carpet in his classic black tuxedo.

He wore a crisp white shirt and bow tie, with freshly shined black shoes.

Sharp! Brotherhood star Jason Clarke (pictured), 50, cut a sharp figure on the red carpet in his classic black tuxedo

Dapper chap: The First Man actor wore a crisp white shirt and bow tie, with freshly shined black shoes
description: Ruby Rose and Isla Fisher (pictured) joined a host of famous faces on the red carpet for this year's Australians in Film Awards.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
